Articles.Content:
Hi,

I currently use these mods: MechJeb2, StationScience (+ NASAmission, Squad). I think they are not related to my problem.

Here is a screenshot and one of my settings.

Why is the background/skybox texture so blurry?

TIA

Edited January 10, 2015 by marian
Are you using Texture Replacer or Active Texture Management? Neither should cause this, but those are the first two candidates that come into my mind.
I only use the mods mentioned above. (Assuming they need to be in the GameData folder).

What is your Texture resolution set as? Full Res? Half Res? Eighth Res? Ive noticed at half res the sky box is not that noticeably blurry but anything past half the sky box gets very blurry.

Edit: Nevermind just saw your settings. I just woke up. Im groggy.

Usually your integrated graphics or graphics card has their own settings menu. There should be a slider that says "Quality" on one side and "Performance" on the other, depending on how crappy said graphics card is. If you would please, set that slider all the way to "Quality".
